DOC.brief_summary: Study of the kinetics of uremic toxins in the ICU patients with acute renal failure, in order to optimize the dialysis dose: patients with sepsis/multi-organ failure. The sampling of blood and dialysate will be done during dialyses with different durations (4, 6 and 8h)
DOC.brief_title: Uremic Toxins in the Intensive Care Unit (ICU): Patients With Sepsis
DOC.criteria: ICU patients with sepsis/multiorgan failure with acute renal failure
DOC.keyword: ICU patients with acute renal failure with sepsis/multi-organ failure
